page.title: 09G.E.C. TURBINES.
page.content: Mr.Stringer,site manager,of G.E.C. Willans Works,invited us to visit him to learn about G.E.C. It is the largest private company in the U.K., employing a total of 187000 people. One section of G.E.C.is called G.E.C. Turbine Generators Ltd.,which employes 8000 people together at its 4 sites. 2750 of these work at the Willan's site.Approx.one quarter of all those who work in Rugby are employees of G.E.C. either at Willan's or at the G.E.C.site in Mill Road, where they make large machines and electrical equipment.The firm began originally back in 1896,under the name of Willan's and Robinson Ltd., with the Newbold Rd. site being called The Victoria Works.The firm began in Kingston-upon-Thames,with an engineer called Peter Willans,from Lincoln.
